news_header: Wetter's subsidiary Wetteri Auto acquires Hed's Automotive Kia and Mitsubishi business in Lahti for €150,000.
news_original_title: Wetteri ostaa Hedin Automotiven bisneksiä Lahdessa
news_text: Wetter's subsidiary Wetteri Auto has purchased Hed's Automotive Kia and Mitsubishi business in Lahti for approximately €150,000. This acquisition will allow Wetter to manage the sale and maintenance of new Kia and Mitsubishi vehicles in Lahti, expanding its operations to several new locations. Following this transaction, Wetter will have representation in multiple cities including Oulu, Joensuu, and Rovaniemi, increasing its annual sales volume to around 1,650 vehicles and a turnover of approximately €130 million. Wetter's CEO, Aarne Simula, stated that the company's market share for Kia and Mitsubishi in Finland is around 20%. The business transfer is expected to be completed by March 1, with existing staff being retained.
